q1: Who is the most popular player on the Real Madrid football team?
a1: It would have to be Marcelo.
q2: Will Marcelo be Real this year?
a2: He is still currently with Real Madrid, but there is interest from Juventus.
q3: Do you think that he'll move to Juventus?
q4: When was the last time they won the Champions League?
a4: They won last season didnt they?
q5: Real Madrid is the greatest champion of the champions?
a5: Yes they are the greatest champion of the champions
